Guantanamo Bay` one of the finest prison systems in the world'- Donald Rumsfeld The`` war on terror'' prison at the US naval base in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba is one of the finest prison systems in the world , former defence secretary Donald Rumsfeld said in an interview with Fox News.
